review_title: Not terrible but hard to recommend
one_reviews_text:
Pros: The gesture-based spellcasting is fun and easy to use.  I laughed at a comment the shopkeeper made.  Can't remember the last time I laughed at intentional humor.  

Cons: The graphics are very basic, and the voice-acting is far from great.  The physics, collision, etc. is also lacking, as is the combat with the few enemies I encountered.  It has some RPG elements, but they are "lite".

Overall, this isn't a terrible game, but I can't really imagine recommending it over other options.  It comes across more as a hobby project than as a commercial product.
